meanings.sent1: The uncontrolled puppy ran around the yard freely.
meanings.sent2: The uncontrolled fire spread quickly through the forest.
meanings.sent3: The uncontrolled laughter of the children filled the room.
meanings.sent4: Her uncontrolled excitement bubbled over at the surprise party.
meanings.sent5: The uncontrolled chaos of the carnival was exhilarating.

meanings.sent1: The uncontrolled market fluctuations caused uncertainty among investors.
meanings.sent2: The uncontrolled experiment led to unexpected results.
meanings.sent3: The uncontrolled dance party lasted until the early hours of the morning.
meanings.sent4: His uncontrolled spending habits left him in financial trouble.
meanings.sent5: The uncontrolled growth of the plants took over the garden.

meanings.definition: Not held in check or limited.
meanings.sent1: The uncontrolled population growth led to overcrowding in the city.
meanings.sent2: The uncontrolled emotions spilled out during the argument.
meanings.sent3: The uncontrolled speed of the roller coaster thrilled the riders.
meanings.sent4: Her uncontrolled ambition drove her to achieve great success.
meanings.sent5: The uncontrolled power of the storm caused widespread damage.
